plot: A young songwriter leaves his Kentucky home to try to make it in New Orleans. Eventually he winds up in New York, where he sells his songs to a music publisher, but refuses to sell his most treasured composition: &"Dixie.&" The film is based on the life of Daniel Decatur Emmett, who wrote the classic song &"Dixie.&"   Written by  frankfob2@yahoo.com
title: El cantor del río
